subject: Order cancellation, refund request. It's urgent.
description_text:
I canceled my order, when will I be able to get a refund for my card
payment? I need to repurchase it with a different card, but I haven't
received a refund yet, so I can't place the order.

Order number SSN4432

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 10587 中
